ygData.subject: new guild this saturday
ygData.msgSnippet: Short notice, but if anyone would like to join in helping a new guild, Nameless Love, get authorized on The Nameless server...  we ll be meeting at noon
ygData.messageBody:
Short notice, but if anyone would like to join in helping a new guild, Nameless
Love, get authorized on The Nameless server... we'll be meeting at noon
central time on Saturday the 4th. We have more than the necessary 10 people,
but every extra person helps in case something comes up at the last minute for
someone else.

My name there is SoulDreamer. We have a small website set up at http://
www.sweetvision.com/~namelesslove .

We tried this effort 2 months ago (before the EQ guild freeze) but we couldn't
rally 10 people online at once. I'm sure we'll make it this time, but an extra
hand is always welcome.

If you want to be "physically" with the rest of us, we're be at the Isle of
Lesbos. (When none but a few of us guild members were on the island between
Qeynos and Erudin, we claimed it in the name of queerdom.) We have high level
characters there who can teleport you there if you show up well before noon.
Just message SoulDreamer for help.

Thanks, hope to see you there. Meet us at Lesbos, or just give me a /tell :)
